directions: Stir goat cheese, 1/4 cup olive oil, and lemon juice together in a small bowl; season with salt and black pepper.
Place a spoonful of goat cheese mixture onto each basil leaf. Wrap the basil leaf around the goat cheese to form a ball. Drizzle with olive oil.
ingredients: 5 ounces goat cheese, at room temperature
2 teaspoons extra-virgin olive oil, or as needed
title: Prim's Basil-Wrapped Goat Cheese Balls
